title: Analyze Viewership Data for a Pilot Episode
description: A TV network needs a report on the viewership performance of a new show's pilot episode to decide whether to order a full season.

tasks.description: Gather all viewership data for the pilot episode across linear broadcast and on-demand streaming.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete dataset of viewership numbers.

tasks.description: Analyze viewer retention throughout the episode (minute-by-minute drop-off rate).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a significant viewer drop-off after the first 10 minutes.

tasks.description: Compare the pilot's performance against historical data for successful shows in the same genre.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the pilot underperformed by 30% compared to the average successful drama.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report with key metrics and a recommendation against ordering a full season.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise report with a clear, data-driven recommendation.
